Get a bloody Mary. Best in town
Order the Boudin Basque.
Get the sesame pancake with vegetables. Delivious and so much better than it sounds.

popular amongst the chef crowd after work. rustic, hearty, and fulfilling. Definitely sit downstairs if you can.
definitely worth the trip uptown. Awesome brunch!
The best brunch ever! Be prepared to wait for a table!

the chicken is good, still not sure whether its as good as the Yard Bird at Red Rooster!
The closest thing to authentic soup dumplings in new york. The crispy beef is also really good.
An institution in Harlem, but Sylvia's now has tons of competition. Grits are good :)
dragon bowl!!
one of the best places to go on a romantic date! Locally sourced menu, loved the asparagus \

Can't be be beat for a wicked combo of price, quality, and atmosphere.
My latest craving at Crif: the Jon Jon. It will change your life!
Great menu, wholesome american cuisine, and a place you could go back to over and over again.
You are actually better off ordering apps for dinner, they have an amazing selection!
definitely the place to hit up the morning after...perogi sampler please?
Eat out back on the patio. Everyday Italian, and they deliver!
Great value for the money. They even deliver. Try and score a table out on the patio!
Spaghetti Neri: amazing! Also, I had a pasta special once with tuna meatballs. It was off the hook!
the pastas here are such a great value for the money, as long as you don't mind waiting!

Consistently one of the best restaurants in New York. When truffles are in season, order the truffle tasting. Its magnificent.
the only place I go for dim sum! An unforgetable experience!
The everday burger of West Chelsea. No frills, no dent in your wallet.
I know, everyone comes here for burgers, but half the time I get the bird dog and swig it down with a frozen custard. Is that so wrong?
I love this quaint tapas bar, and the menu is authentic. The brandada is delicious, the clams are also excellent. Always crowded and they don't take reservations.
I love the menu here, and the patio is perfect!
must order the guacamole, which they make tableside fresh. Authentic tasty mexican food, and they even have live Mariachi music! Great place to celebrate a birthday!

My home away from home in the old hood! So disappointed 202 is gone!

get the omakase, period. The crepe mille feuille for dessert is good too!

I love the brussels sprouts here, delish!!

Man the margaritas here are bangin! With food to match of course...
authentic mexican, but be prepared as this popular destination is in high demand!!
do yourself a favor and order the tortilla soup. The best!

Brunch, amazing. I also had a parsnip soup here once that was spot on.

I love coming here late night during the week. The beer is on point, and the food is finger lickin good.
portion sizes are gargantuan here! You can easily order an entree and split it with someone else.

Authentic spanish tapas, great atmosphere and location.

for traditional japanese sushi, this place is on point! It is pricey, but I think it is worth it.

I love that you see Lydia Bastianich circulating the restaurant from time to time.
one of my favorite places for brunch. quaint, simple, delicious.

unusual menu, and very tasty. You won't be disappointed!

online reservations only, yikes, what a nightmare trying to get in here!

best spot for reading a book and grabbing a sandwich on a sunday afternoon.
